embeds.title: Server Rules
embeds.description:
:x:  Problems occurring outside this server should not be brought in and any problems you have with a fellow user should be discussed privately with an administrator. 

:x:  Repeated attempts at bringing any malcontent into the server may result in up to and including a ban. 

:x:  A long period, generally longer than two weeks, of inactivity without any given reason will result in a kick with no warning. Inactivity in this server refers to not joining a session, talking in the rp channels does not constitute activity. Speak to an administrator in direct messages should you have a reason to stay.

:x:  Do not post the invite link publicly outside of the MCDM discord and the r/lfg post: https://www.reddit.com/r/lfg/comments/ng568a/weekly_community_post_post_your_communities/gyxxfdq?utm_medium=android_app&utm_source=share&context=3

✅  Do invite your friends: https://discord.gg/rDv5tEm

✅  Keep nicknames within Discord TOS.

✅  Read the pins and channel topics. Read the books through whatever means you can.

✅  You must @ an <@&638932299689230347> / <@&638939302776274964> about becoming a player regardless of the time of day in <#638916858791329806>. If one role is unresponsive @ the other. You can also ask in DMs

embeds.title: Gameplay Rules
embeds.description:
<#723713428337721385>  - You are here.
<#829184619525177384>  - ❗❗ READ THIS ❗❗ This is required to create a character and start playing on the server. These rules are nonnegotiable in every session. 
<#651319535156330496>  - Some DMs will post information about their play-style and rulings outside of the server-wide rules.
<#687689116464578607> - If you do not have the <@&638929930310385674> role, you cannot view this channel. Lays down the rules with no exceptions.

embeds.title: Sessions
embeds.description:
<#651242412286672906> - <@&638931948424921097> post missions in here using the Sesh bot and create a thread for the session. <@&638931693214105622> use the buttons to sign up. Check your DMs for instructions on how to get reminded before sessions. Then join the thread to announce which character you are bringing. All session-related messages and pings will be done in the thread.
<#651242490862501899> - Accept posts from the mission board in this channel, you MUST @ the relevant DM regardless of the time of day, or react to the quest post to be counted. 
<#651242550186868783> - When a player writes a summary of the session they participated in, they get compensation. (This process will be automated with Smashford bot soon.)
<#651787688801730599> - Knowledge of the actual items in channel is on a per mission basis unless one character actually told another, <@&638931948424921097> must put all gold xp and item rewards from the mission in their postings
<#961716179569897524> - Record settlements, buildings, feats, etc here.

embeds.title: Items
embeds.description:
<#970803410171490334> - Sell items from living or deceased characters, no retired ones. You can sell any mundane (non-magical) items at half cost without a downtime.
<#651592429312671766> - Wish upon a d20 to find your perfect magic item.

embeds.title: Others
embeds.description:
<#638916858791329806> - Keep discussion lighthearted and any quarrels to DMs, hide spoilers the usual way
<#638918013579558932> - For the majority of images; to keep other channels clean
<#638932779266080788> - Put character art and maybe descriptions here for all to see.
<#652326388631863306> - Lay to rest fallen characters here.
<#668711243363647488> - For posterity's sake.
<#638917778761580555> - No impact font memes allowed, you boomers
<#638917735191019539> - For playing music and using bot capabilities, use bot commands in here only to keep the other channels clean. Pinned are the commands for the relevant bots.
<#638932752783114280> - For dice rolls so it won't clog music-and-bot.
